trans-unit.source: Approve your consent
Please approve your consent
Hello %s
your consent was registered successfully. Please click the following link to approve it:
If you feel this consent was given by accident or if you want to dismiss it, please click the following link:
The consent mail could not be sent.
Invalid link
The link you clicked is no longer valid or has already been clicked. Please fill out the form again.
Invalid email address
The email address sent with the link is not valid. Please fill out the form again.
Consent already given
The link you clicked has already been clicked. This means that consent has already been given and the link is no longer valid.
Unknown error
An unknown error has occurred. Please try clicking the link from the email again. If the problem persists, please fill out the form again.
Consent successful
Thank you, your approval was successful. You can now delete the email.
Invalid link
The link you clicked is no longer valid or has already been clicked.
Invalid email address
The email address sent with the link is not valid. Please fill out the form again.
Unknown error
An unknown error has occurred. Please try clicking the link from the email again. If the problem persists, please fill out the form again.
Consent successfully revoked
You have successfully revoked your consent. You can now delete the email.
